description:
Are you a right-brained or a left-brained? Tara Lindhal, who is a psychologist, introduces the concepts and shows some research that indicates programmers might need to use both sides of their brain. How do you feel when you code? How error messages impact your ability to solve problems?
Some links: Concussion, CTE, Frontal lobe, Temporal lobe, Hippocampus, Occipital lobe. Limbic system
title: This is your brain on JS
